title: WhiteList总是连接不上,显示的测试是-1
author: weiai1213
txt_content:
发测试过去回复：返回: -1(0为对接成功,-1为连接失败,1为密码错误)

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
rcon.port的端口号换一下呢
server.properties和酷Q whitelist.ini配置里的那个

replies.author: weiai1213
replies.txt_content:

server.properties和酷Q whitelist.ini配置里的那个
